segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, forming a huge puddle, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so oblivious to such a mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, but the floor is turning into a lake.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just exhausted or completely lost in thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she doesn’t turn around soon, the whole kitchen will be flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the children either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange scene, like something out of a surreal painting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone walks in and alerts her before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
